entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
